content:
Posted: July 28, 2014
												This is the Sequel to Wedding dash, similar gameplay as the previous one and the diner dash games :) It's all about keeping everybody happy and making as many chains as possible. Easy and fun, and a perfect game for killing time without thinking too hard about what you are doing. Would have been extra fun with steam achievements :)  And it's weird that Wedding Dash 1 and 3 isn't on steam... If you like time management games, cute characters and the other dash games then this is a fun game for you :)

content:
Posted: June 17, 2014
												If you are like me and enjoy Diner Dash and the other many Dash games, than you should enjoy this one as well. It's quirky, quite easy and can be played a little at a time or a lot. No matter what you are doing this game will give you some time to kill and something to do that can be kind of fun.
